Title: Rapid Fire Plans
Description:
Elemental orbs, eh? If there's earth, there's bound to be fire!

The primalists over near tae hornswog nests are reshapin' tae land with lava. If anyone has an interest in tae Orb o' Primal Flames, it'd be them!

Take them out and see if they have anythin' useful!
ObjectivesText: Collect Primal Flame Fragments from Primalist Forces in Hornswog Hollow.
CompletionText: Acadia had a lead on the Orb of Primal Flames. Have you found it?
RewardText: Ah, the Orb of Primal Flames. It is as vibrant and fiery as Acadia. I will hold onto it for now.
